ja444:3.2: adaṃsī → adaṃsi (bj); aḍaṃsī (sya1ed, sya2ed); aḍatthi (pts-vp-pli1) | sacarā → bilarā (bj); biḷārā (sya1ed, sya2ed); patarā (pts-vp-pli1)
ja444:5.2: eḷamūgova bālo → eḷamūgo capalo (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); elamūgo va bālo (pts-vp-pli1)
ja444:5.5: Viññuppasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ → viññūpasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); viññūpasatthaṃ vasitaṃ ca ṭhānaṃ (mr)
ja444:7.4: antimagandhano → gandhino (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja444:9.6: paddhacarāmhi → baddhacarāsmi (bj); paṭṭhacarāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed); baddhacarāmi (pts-vp-pli1); paṭṭhacarāmhi (mr)
ja444:10.1: bhāsiṃ yamabhāsaneyyaṃ → bhāsissaṃ abhāsaneyyaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); bhāsissa'mabhāsaneyyaṃ (?)
